page.title: 04Housing
page.content: We have about fifty to eighty five{houses}in our area,nine are{farms ,the dates when they were made vary in age. There are four different kinds of houses;detached,semi-detached,terraced and bungalow. Fifty new{houses}are going to be built in the field next to Turpits Lane in the near future. The old fort is a house in a way because people sleep there. The area we are covering is big but there are not many houses in it because of the type of land.There can not be many houses built anyway because the area is close to the blast area for BP. The largest house in the area is Borreas Hill which used to be a manor farm.
